resultType.name: StartTransactionResult
resultType.description: This class defines a container that enables the SE-API function startTransaction to return informations about the newly created transaction.

field.name: transactionNumber
field.description: The value of this parameter represents a transaction number that has been assigned to the process by the Secure Element.

field.name: signatureCreationTime
field.description: The value represents the point in time of the Secure Element when the log message was signed.

field.name: serialNumber
field.description: This field contains the hash value over the public key of the key pair that is used for the signature creation for transaction logs.

field.name: signatureCounter
field.description: The value of the signature counter of the created log message.

field.name: signatureValue
field.description: The signature value of the created log message.
